document.full_text: nato officials have said they regard the introduction of attack helicopters as potential game changers in a conflict that has shown signs of settling into a stalemate.
document.title: nato begins helicopter attacks in hopes of ending the stalemate with qaddafi
lines_and_colors: nato officials have said they regard the introduction of attack helicopters as potential game changers in a conflict that has shown signs of settling into a stalemate.
